sentences.en: Academic group spread out a harangue to this, summarize main point of view now after.
sentences.cn: 理论界对此展开了热烈的讨论, 现将主要观点综述于后.

sentences.en: Deliver an angry, hour - long harangue against a person.
sentences.cn: 对某人发表愤怒 、 长达一小时的喋喋不休的训斥.

sentences.en: Fourth Master Liu's harangue rankled in each heart.
sentences.cn: 刘四爷的话使人人心中窝住一点气愤不平.

sentences.en: Harangue in friend and colleague computer major term when whether do you feel lose one's head?
sentences.cn: 在朋友和同事高谈阔论计算机专业术语的时候你是否感觉手足无措 呢 ?

sentences.en: On and on the harangue went , an endless sport.
sentences.cn: 无休止的慷慨激昂, 无休止的戏谑挖苦.
那篇长篇演说很郑重其事.

sentences.en: The minister of propaganda delivered his harangue.
sentences.cn: 宣传部长一如既往发表了他的“长篇大论”.

sentences.en: The minister of propaganda delivered his usual harangue.
sentences.cn: 宣传部长一如既往发表了他的长篇大论.

sentences.en: Through the harangue, pass overall program evaluation consistently.
sentences.cn: 经过热烈的讨论, 一致通过总体方案评审.

sentences.en: To this, economist people spread out a harangue.
sentences.cn: 对此, 经济学家们展开了热烈的讨论.

sentences.en: We had to listen to a long harangue about our own shortcomings.
sentences.cn: 我们必须去听一有关我们缺点的长篇大论.

words.tran_cn: 长篇大论；高谈阔论；热烈的演说
